wikitext.*:
'''The Cambridge Tolkien Society''', CTS, is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] of [[Cambridge]], England founded in 1983.<ref>http://tolkien.soc.ucam.org/ (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref>

==Publications==
CTS has published its magazine '' Anor''<ref>https://tolkien.soc.ucam.org/Anor
(accessed 22-04-2025)</ref> since it was founded, continuing to publish new issues once or twice a year. Back issues can be accessed for free through their website. 
 
==External links==
* [https://tolkien.soc.ucam.org Official Website]
